attributes.action: Give more thought to the present method of taxing motor vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to being physically disabled I have to use a vehicle which I can access easily and also transport my mobility scooter.  I do not qualify for mobility allowance as I was too old when registering as disabled.  I use a Toyuta Corolla Verso which is almost 6 yr's old and has only done 17 k miles.  Not polluting the atmosphere as much as a 1.4 which does 10k per year.Public transport i.e bus,train or taxis do not cover the needs for me moving around.  I am sure that there are many more with the same predicament.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
